title: question about gifting RP/money
body:
since i can't get on league at the moment to check the gifting center...
if i get a $25 RP card at gamestop or something would i be able to split that up if i wanted to gift people rp? like would i be able to go into the gift center, check rp, and click the $5 gift one, and instead of buying it with money using an actual credit card, just put in the code for the $25 card i got, and it'd just take $5 off the card?
or do i have to get an actual visa or paypal card, put money on there and buy it like that? (which is a whole nother hassle on top of what i already have to do.. which is why i asked if there's an easier way to go about this.)

replies.body:
The only way to gift RP at the moment, is to do so by purchasing it through the store using the gifting center. It's not possible to divvy up certain amount from prepaid RP or any RP on your account.

Check out our [Gifting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) for more info and let me know if you have any other questions.
